help.tooltip.stick.marker.simple.1: Used to mark a new region.
help.tooltip.stick.marker.simple.2: Keep the Region Marker in your hand while defining a region!
help.tooltip.stick.marker.optional.1: 2a. [Optional] Expand the region from Y 0 to 255 with the "/wp expand vert" command or by holding down the right mouse button.
help.tooltip.stick.marker.optional.2: 2b. [Optional] SHIFT + Right-click allows you to mark a block as the regions teleportation target.
help.tooltip.stick.marker.detail.1:
A region is marked by two blocks.
The Region Marker toggles between the 1st and 2nd block after clicking.
help.tooltip.stick.marker.detail.2:
1. Left-click on the 1st block to start marking a region.
2. Left-click on the 2nd block to finish marking a region.
help.tooltip.stick.marker.detail.3: 3. Define the region with the "/wp region define <name>" command or by renaming the Region Marker in an anvil.
help.tooltip.stick.marker.detail.4: Keep the Region Marker in your hand while defining a region!
help.tooltip.stick.flag-stick.simple.1: Use the Flag Stick to simply modify flags for a region.
help.tooltip.stick.flag-stick.simple.2: Keep the Region Stick in your offhand!
help.tooltip.stick.flag-stick.detail.1: 1. Select a flag by right clicking.
help.tooltip.stick.flag-stick.detail.2: 2. Switch modes by SHIFT right clicking.
help.tooltip.stick.flag-stick.detail.3: 3. Hold down the right mouse button to add/remove the selected flag.
help.tooltip.stick.flag-stick.detail.4: [Secondary use] SHIFT right click on a container with name tags, named after flags, to add/remove all the corresponding flags!
help.tooltip.stick.flag-stick.detail.5: Keep the Region Stick with the selected region in your off hand!
help.tooltip.stick.region-stick.simple.1: Use the Region Stick to simply add/remove players to/from a region.
help.tooltip.stick.region-stick.detail.1: 1. Select an existing region by right clicking.
help.tooltip.stick.region-stick.detail.2: 2. Switch modes by SHIFT right clicking.
help.tooltip.stick.region-stick.detail.3: 3. Hit the player you want to add/remove (don't worry it wont hurt).
help.tooltip.stick.region-stick.detail.4: [Secondary use] Keep the Region Stick in your offhand and read the Flag Stick tooltip.
flag.deny.message.break: You are not allowed to break blocks here!
flag.deny.message.place: You are not allowed to place blocks here!
